summaries.short: Attorney E.B. Jonathan hires Perry Mason to solve what could be the case of the decade - the kidnapping of one-year-old Charlie Dodson.
summaries.full: Series premiere. Los Angeles, 1931. Perry Mason - a PI struggling to make ends meet - and his right-hand man Pete Strickland are hired by attorney E.B. Jonathan, Perry's mentor, to solve a perplexing case: the brutal kidnapping of one-year-old Charlie Dodson, whose parents Matthew and Emily were targeted for a $100,000 ransom.

summaries.short: Enjoy an in-depth look at the HBO series Perry Mason with the cast and crew.
summaries.full: Enjoy an in-depth look at the HBO series Perry Mason with the cast and crew.

summaries.short: Matthew Rhys stars in this HBO series about the origins of legendary fictional criminal defense lawyer, Perry Mason. Premieres June 21.
summaries.full: Matthew Rhys stars in this HBO series about the origins of legendary fictional criminal defense lawyer, Perry Mason. Premieres June 21.

summaries.full: See what's coming up on the HBO Original series 'Perry Mason.'

summaries.short: Sister Alice impulsively offers the Dodsons the church's financial support. A jaw-dropping admission from Baggerly meets Mason's wrath.
summaries.full: Sister Alice offers the Dodsons the church's full moral and financial support. During a routine intervention, beat cop Paul Drake is rerouted to a gruesome crime scene, where he follows a confusing trail of evidence. Mason is left incensed by a jaw-dropping admission from Baggerly and, after pressing Emily on her husband's alibi, finds himself confronted by an outraged Della.

summaries.short: Mason gains unauthorized access to evidence with help from his connect at the morgue and tries to extract intel from an unyielding Drake.
summaries.full: Maynard Barnes goes public with a shocking new development. Mason and Strickland get unauthorized access to physical evidence with help from Virgil, Mason's connect at the city morgue. Later, Mason attempts to extract information from a withholding Drake, who's weary of Holcomb and Ennis' watchful eyes. Della notices a change in E.B., who seems out of sorts.

summaries.short: Mason leans on Virgil once again for extra-legal assistance. Birdy urges Sister Alice to renounce her claims about baby Charlie.
summaries.full: Mason and Strickland lean on Virgil, again, for extra-legal assistance. Following Sister Alice's recovery from a frightening episode, Birdy urges her daughter to renounce her claims about baby Charlie. E.B. faces the reality of his financial situation and takes his frustrations out on Della.
